exclaimed several voices. 
"I'll drink it! Let's have a bottle of rum!" shouted Pierre, banging the table with a deter- mined and drunken gesture and preparing to climb out of the window. 
They seized him by his arms; but he was so strong that everyone who touched him was sent flying. 
"No, you'll never manage him that way," said Anatole. "Wait a bit and I'll get round him. . . . Listen! I'll take your bet tomorrow, but now we are all going to V
